block.p: Victoria Anne Van Hyning, the daughter of Marlene C. Piturro and Howard M. Van Hyning of Hastings-on-Hudson, N.Y., was married yesterday to Alyn Timothy Still, a son of Helen Still and Michael T. Still of Wrexham, Wales. Jon Berry, a member of the ministry and counsel committee of the Purchase Friends Meeting in Purchase, N.Y., oversaw the Quaker ceremony there.

The bride, 22, will keep her name. She was until December the assistant to the archivist and special collections librarian at Goucher College in Baltimore. In October she is to begin studying for a master's in Middle English at Oxford University. She graduated from Goucher.

Victoria Anne Van Hyning, the daughter of Marlene C. Piturro and Howard M. Van Hyning of Hastings-on-Hudson, N.Y., was married yesterday to Alyn Timothy Still, a son of Helen Still and Michael T. Still of Wrexham, Wales. Jon Berry, a member of the ministry and counsel committee of the Purchase Friends Meeting in Purchase, N.Y., oversaw the Quaker ceremony there.

Victoria Anne Van Hyning, the daughter of Marlene C. Piturro and Howard M. Van Hyning of Hastings-on-Hudson, N.Y., was married yesterday to Alyn Timothy Still, a son of Helen Still and Michael T. Still of Wrexham, Wales. Jon Berry, a member of the ministry and counsel committee of the Purchase Friends Meeting in Purchase, N.Y., oversaw the Quaker ceremony there.

The bride, 22, will keep her name. She was until December the assistant to the archivist and special collections librarian at Goucher College in Baltimore. In October she is to begin studying for a master's in Middle English at Oxford University. She graduated from Goucher.

Her father, who retired as the principal percussionist of the New York City Opera Orchestra, owns Van Percussion Services, which rents musical instruments, in Dobbs Ferry, N.Y. Her mother writes about health care economics in Caring for the Ages, The Hospitalist and other trade publications.
Mr. Still, 23, was until January a manager of the Oxford Quaker Center in England. He is a Web site and database designer in Oxford. He graduated from Oxford University.
His mother is a speech therapist in Wrexham. His father retired as the deputy principal and an art teacher at Moor House School in Oxted, England.
